text: Rapsommati (, also Ραψομμάτης - Rapsommatis) is a village within the municipality of Megalopoli in the western part of Arcadia, Greece. It is situated on a hill, 1 km southeast of Mallota, 2 km southwest of Palaiochouni, 3 km northwest of Anemodouri and 5 km southeast of Megalopoli. The Moreas Motorway (Corinth - Tripoli - Kalamata) passes north of the village, through the Artemisio Tunnel. ==Historical population== {| class="wikitable" ! Year !!
